items.content:
Salesforce B2B Commerce Developer

About this job

Job type: Full-time
Experience level: Mid-Level
Role: Frontend Developer, Full Stack Developer
Industry: B2B, Technology Consulting
Company size: 11–50 people
Company type: Private
Company: 6 Street Technologies, LLC | No office location

Remote details

Preferred Timezone: (GMT-06:00) Central Time +/- 2 hours

Technologies

salesforce
apex
visualforce
javascript
salesforce-lightning

Job description

6 Street Tech. has been developing cutting edge Salesforce B2B Commerce storefronts for our customers before CloudCraze was acquired. For the past 7 years (since 2012) 6Street has been using the newest technologies on the Salesforce platform to create these B2B Commerce sites and providing incredible value back to our customers. We are a fast paced, enthusiastic team that is growing by leaps and bounds!

We are looking for developers who love solving problems, using new technologies, and working directly with customers. We are a laid back but tight knit group who thrive working in a 100% remote environment. There's flexibility, and it's an opportunity to get in on the ground floor.

You'll be working with solution architects, technical architects, and developers on numerous projects. The work is fast paced, challenging, and rewarding. We aim to mentor and grow our developers to become leaders in the organization so there will be no shortage of opportunities.

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:

  • Works effectively individually but also can collaborate with 6 Street Technologies and with customer team members toward customer satisfaction and success
  • Takes direction from project team members and immediate supervisor, but takes initiative and shows leadership when appropriate
  • Is able to exercise independent judgment on medium-sized, large, and enterprise engagements, or take a lead role on key components of a larger project.
  • Demonstrates the ability to perform Salesforce.com administration / configuration / data migration / integration duties as directed.

Skills & Requirements

MUST HAVE:

  • 3+ years experience with Visualforce/Apex coding on the Force.com platform
  • 2+ years experience with Salesforce administration
  • 2+ years experience HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Ajax, JQuery
  • Ability to work independently
  • Ability to learn quickly and think creatively
  • Willingness to jump in on multiple projects when necessary

NICE TO HAVE:

  • Salesforce Developer Certification such as Salesforce Platform Developer 1, Platform Developer 2, etc.
  • Salesforce Lightning component development experience
  • Backbone.js or AngularJS 1 experience
  • Handlebars experience
  • Experience with git
  • 2+ years of experience with Web Application Development utilizing technologies such as Java, .NET, Web Services
Apply now

About 6 Street Technologies, LLC

Come work at a place where all your achievements are noticed and appreciated. Our team is strong and business is booming in the Salesforce B2B Commerce space. Be a part of something being built from the ground up.

Work on important, industry changing projects. Several projects we have collaborated on have been featured in Dreamforce keynotes!

6Street. is a company where you get to work with the newest technologies in the Salesforce ecosystem. Our partners depend on us to provide a rewarding customer experience not only from our solutions but from us.

Benefits

  • Work from home
  • Employer-Sponsored 401(k) and Profit Sharing Plan
  • Flexible paid-time-off
  • Flexible health insurance options including dental and vision
  • Wellness program encouraging healthy living
  • Basic life, AD&D, short/long term disability, voluntary life insurance

items.title: Salesforce Architect (Remote)
items.content:
Stefanini is hiring!

We are hiring a Salesforce Marketing Cloud Architect who will be responsible for delivering high quality technical work, including setup, code, configuration, and validation, to enable a large-scale, complex implementation of the Salesforce Marketing Cloud. The person in this role MUST have extensive Marketing Cloud development and implementation experience, and be able to confidently design & enable complexities beyond a simple CRM connection - for example, multi-org connections, conflicting visibility requirements when connecting to a Salesforce CRM system, roles, sharing & visibility in CRM and their effects on marketing, migration from other marketing systems, etc.

Responsibilities:

The role is comprised of two main elements: technical design & development, in collaboration with the lead technical architect and functional/business team members, and completion of configuration and development efforts in a timely and effective manner, while working with other US-based and offshore development team members.

This implementation of the Marketing Cloud will be completed in a fast-paced, collaborative environment with multiple stakeholders, an international virtual team, and a tight series of deadlines; this role must be collaborative, a self-starter and team player, who can help drive the team to succeed and who is willing to pitch in wherever necessary to help the team get to done.

Attend daily Agile standups and provide concise updates regarding completed effort and any blockers or concerns

Quickly come up to speed on a large and complex multinational Salesforce CRM implementation, to best advise on Marketing Cloud design & setup needs

Complete setup of environment, connection to CRM, configuration of business units & other critical Marketing Cloud functionality, development **in both the CRM and the Marketing systems** to enable required business outcome

Join selected meetings with business users to understand requirements

Interface with other technical teams, information security, to clearly and articulately present technical designs for review and approval

Interface with US-based and offshore team members, with clean handoffs of code & other responsibilities, to ensure effective development

Document architectural designs

Salesforce enterprise-scale architectural design and application delivery;

Established SDLC methodologies including agile, scrum;

Robust analytical thinking skills with the ability to identify, debug and resolve technical issues;

Architectural domain knowledge including cloud application architecture and container-based deployment;

Business acumen that can interpret and translate goals into technical specifications, delivering thought leadership of specific technologies and driving technology change;

Business knowledge and interpersonal skills to build, maintain and influence relationships with key stakeholders.

Collaborating with other Architects and Developers to provide technical design guidance to align with firm strategy and applicable technical standards;

Working independently to evaluate and make strategic decisions that will address specific technology design needs;

Collaborating with multidisciplinary teams in resolving complex technical issues; providing design guidance that follows the enterprise architecture vision and adheres to applicable application technology guidelines; and mitigating the impact of technical design to security, performance and data privacy;

Participating in application solutions including assisting with planning and architectural design, hands-on development, resolution of technical issues

5+ years experience in software development life cycle

5+ year experience in Salesforce development and implementing Marketing systems

3+ years experience with Exact Target/Salesforce Marketing Cloud

Salesforce Administrator certification, Salesforce Developer Certification, and Marketing Cloud Consultant certification

Ability to work with a large project (experience required) and excellent communication skills are required in order to work well with the business and team.

Essential skills:

Knowledge of Salesforce execution flow, governor limits, design limitations;

Experience with design & hands-on coding of Cloud Pages and AMPscipt;

Knowledge or exposure to Marketing Cloud Connect Integration;

Experience working with Multiple Business Units in Marketing Cloud;

Deep understanding of Salesforce security;

Experience with Salesforce REST APIs and Postman;

Expert level understanding of the Salesforce Sales and Marketing Cloud solutions, as well as the Force.com Platform;

Experience with Salesforce Development and general salesforce components such as objects, fields, workflow rules, field updates, process builder, apex classes, triggers, test classes, etc;

Must be strong in various Marketing Cloud areas - Email Studio, Automation Studio, Mobile Studio, Journey Builder, MC Connect, Audience Builder, Data Extensions, etc.;

Familiarity with integrations using Marketing Cloud API

Education Required: Minimum Bachelor s degree - preferred in Computer Science or related field, but not required / Graduate degree preferred (or equivalent qualification)

Interested applicants may click the apply button or you may call us at for faster processing. Thank you.
- provided by Dice

items.title: Salesforce Developer
items.content:
Xapo

Salesforce Developer

POSITION OVERVIEW Xapo is a fast-growing, global fintech company with a mission to build a safe and global way to use money. We’re a fully distributed team, with 250+ Xapiens working from 50+ countries.  We’re seeking a collaborative, proactive problem-solver to join us as Salesforce Developer at Xapo. This full-time position is planned to be remote, meaning you can work from anywhere! In this role, you will be responsible for owning and customizing our internal Salesforce platform. The ideal candidate is comfortable taking on ownership in a highly technical environment, resourceful, self-motivated, and passionate about understanding and fulfilling their client’s business requirements. BALANCE FOR BETTER At Xapo, we embrace our differences and actively foster an inclusive environment where we all can thrive. We’re a flexible, family-friendly environment, and we recognize that everyone has commitments outside of work. We have a goal of reaching gender parity and strongly encourage women to apply to our open positions. Diversity is not a tagline at Xapo; it is our foundation. RESPONSIBILITIES Develop, enhance, test, support, maintain and debug software applications that support business units or support functions. Work with internal teams to identify requirements and maintain a development schedule. Analyze/identify gaps in functional/business requirements, discuss required changes with product owners to align with Salesforce product stack and architecture. Develop end to end Salesforce solutions using Apex Class, Triggers, Visualforce pages, Lightning components etc. Write technical approach and design documentation as required. BASIC QUALIFICATIONS 5+ years as a software developer. Knowledge of product development lifecycle. Knowledge of DevOps tools like GIT, Jenkins, JIRA etc. Hands-on development experience using Salesforce configuration and customizations using Apex, triggers, etc., Experience defining/working with REST APIs Oral and written proficiency in English. PREFERRED SKILLS Web development skills. Python language. Scrum experience. Amazon Web Services. Remote work experience. OTHER REQUIREMENTS A dedicated workspace.  A reliable internet connection with the fastest speed possible in your area. Devices and other essential equipment that meet minimal technical specifications. Alignment with Our Values. WHY WORK FOR XAPO? Shape the Future: Improve lives through cutting-edge technology, work remotely from anywhere in the world Own Your Success: Receive attractive remuneration, enjoy an autonomous work culture and flexible hours, apply your expertise to meaningful work every day Expect Excellence: Collaborate, learn, and grow with a high-performance team ABOUT XAPO At Xapo, we’re building a way for users all over the world to send, receive, spend, and store their money globally and safely. We're firm believers that no matter who you are or where you're from, you deserve easy access to digital financial services.  Launched in 2014 by Wences Casares (CEO) & Federico Murrone (COO), Xapo has made an unparalleled investment in security infrastructure, assembled a renowned advisory board, and raised $40M from top venture capital firms in Silicon Valley & the world. Xapo is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We believe a team that represents a variety of backgrounds and perspectives is critical to our success as a global company. A diverse, inclusive workplace enables us to create products that best serve our customers all around the world. It is the foundation of Xapo.

SAP4HANA Integration Developer to design, develop, test and implement SAP4HANA outbound data integration with the BOS R&A Azure based solution. This role will utilize the latest SAP4HANA technologies and other various software/middleware components. Role will collaborate with end-users, analysts, and developers to identify requirements for enterprise data connectivity solutions (integrations, interfaces, proxies, objects, shared code library, etc.) with SAP4HANA focus. - U.S Citizens and GC Only

Required Skills and Experience::
  • A bachelor's degree (or higher) or foreign equivalent degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Information Technology or a related field.
  • Experience with integrating SAP4HANA data with an Enterprise Reporting environment in batch and near real time use cases
  • Experience in middleware and enterprise integration including XML/XSLT, Data Transformation, Integration Infrastructure and Web Services (REST/JSON, SOAP/WSDL)
  • Good understanding of XML, SOAP, WSDL, XSD, UDDI, REST, ODATA API's.
  • Experience with any of the following:
    • Should have worked with creating and consuming web services, REST API's.
    • Integration Platform and tools - SAP Process Integration (PI/PO), webMethods, SAP ALE, SAP Cloud Platform Integration (CPI)
    • Experience with Cloud iPaaS platforms, custom API development and the ability to pick up new technical knowledge quickly
    • SAP HANA, SAP UI5, Core Data Services (CDS), Business Objects Processing Framework (BOPF), OData services using Netweaver Gateway.
    • Experience working with Microsoft Azure architecture and components, including SAP4 HANA Integration with Microsoft Azure
  • Experience working with relational databases, data modeling and SQL scripting.
  • Ability to design, develop, document, and support enterprise solutions utilizing design patterns, reference architectures, and best practices.
Desired Skills and Experience:
  • Actual hands on SAP4HANA data integration implementation experience
  • Ability to communicate complex technical concepts in an effective manner to a wide audience of non-technical stakeholders
  • Strong interpersonal skills with the ability to establish strong cross-organizational partnerships.
  • Experienced with development & integration, supporting multifaceted Cloud and on-premise applications and systems environment.

  • An innovative mind-set with excellent problem-solving skills

  • At least 1 year programming required in C# / .NET or equivalent
  • MS SQL Server and SSRS reporting experience -- financial reporting

Desired Qualifications:
  • 2nd Line support and troubleshooting experience - MS Dynamics AX / D365
  • Experience with Inventory Management, Accounts Payable, Accounts Receivable, General Ledgers, and Administration modules of AX/D365FO
  • AX 2012 R3 experience

items.content:
Dynamics NAV/ Business Central Trainer- Remote - Salary: 90k
My client in the Consulting industry is seeking a highly motivated professional to join their team as a NAV/Business Central Trainer. They are looking for someone who has excellent business and communication skills as well as experience working with and training users on Dynamics NAV/Business Central.
Role & Responsibilities:
  • Actively participate in client and prospect requirements gathering meetings
  • Work on training users at various clients throughout the U.S.
  • Work on putting together training materials and coordinating 1 hour up to week long training courses
  • Work on bringing in business opportunities using knowledge gained from client relationships
Requirements:
  • Bachelor's degree
  • Understanding of Dynamics NAV/Business Central especially financial modules
  • Experience with Dynamics NAV/Business Central training and support
  • Passion for working with Dynamics products
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills
This is the opportunity to work for a Consulting Business with an excellent reputation in the market. You would be a highly valued member of the team who is actively contributing to the company's growth and success. They are offering a solid salary of 90k and a competitive benefits package that includes unlimited PTO and the ability to work remote full time.
The company is looking to fill this position ASAP. If you interested in applying for this position Contact me at: ext. 3113 or m.vecchio [Click Here to Email Your Resum?]
